EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congrats on signing up for Community Solar through our BlueWave Friends and Family program. We’re glad to have you on board!
First things first, redeem your $250 bonus by emailing marketing@bluewavesolar.com.
Here's what to expect next on your solar journey:
1. We'll let you know when your solar farm "goes online", meaning credits will begin flowing to your electric bill, reducing what you owe the utility each month.
2. You’ll start receiving bills from BlueWave for those solar credits, with a discount of 10% applied.
3. You can feel great about supporting solar development and your solar-powered savings.
Good things come to those who share in saving the planet. - Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
